body_html: I'm wondering if it's a good idea to add it to enable_grad. I would imagine that it could have an enabled flag, which can make it a no-op, but I would never imagine using enable_grad to actually turn it off. It might be a good idea to add those enable flags to no_grad and with_grad, and have a third decorator torch.grad_mode, which sets it exactly to the value you gave it.

body: I'm wondering if it's a good idea to add it to `enable_grad`. I would imagine that it could have an `enabled` flag, which can make it a no-op, but I would never imagine using `enable_grad` to actually turn it off. It might be a good idea to add those `enable` flags to `no_grad` and `with_grad`, and have a third decorator `torch.grad_mode`, which sets it exactly to the value you gave it.
